scripts.initial: (npm install) && (cd project-backend && npm install) && (cd project-client && npm install)
scripts.dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "client,server" -c "white.bold.bgBlue.bold,white.bold.bgMagenta.bold" "(cd project-client && npm run start)" "(cd project-backend && npm run start)"
scripts.prebuild: (git submodule foreach git checkout main) && (git submodule foreach git pull)
scripts.heroku-postbuild: (cd project-client && npm install && npm run build) && (cd project-backend && npm install)
